description:
Samurai of the A-Ian-Maide. He is a gifted writer and is said to be good at willow and haiku. His body is one size larger than that of the Sorcerer Shogun Vlad, and his weapon of choice is the giant crossed spear 《Zambo Trident》. He is very quiet and is regarded as a mysterious presence by his comrades.
Source: Official page
name: Angus Yarn
